description:
Discover Music & Playlists with Audiomack – Stream & Download Offline

Audiomack is a music player and discovery app that lets you stream and download the hottest songs, mixtapes, albums, and playlists.

On the Audiomack free tier, listen and download songs and albums with no subscription needed. Play full songs and albums with unlimited skips and repeats, even in the background while using other apps. You can even make your own playlists, and stream and share them, all for free.

Whether you're into hip-hop, Afrobeats, R&B, amapiano, Latin, reggae, dancehall, pop, rock, or country, Audiomack helps you discover music and rising artists faster than ever.

Audiomack Free features:
- Stream music with full control: Play full tracks with unlimited skips. Build playlists, repeat your favorite songs, and listen the way you want, free.
- Listen offline, no wifi needed: Download music and mixtapes to your phone and play them anytime, even without data.
- Remix your songs with Audiomod: Customize playback with pitch control, speed adjustment, reverb effects, and presets like Nightcore, Sped Up, Daycore, Slow and Reverb, and more.
- Personalized Music Recommendations: Get new music picked just for you.
- Top charts and trending music: Explore what’s hot locally and globally - see what’s trending on our top music charts.
- Connect with artists: Follow your favorite artists and be the first to hear new releases and exclusive messages.

Audiomack+ (monthly subscription) features:
- No Ads: enjoy your music with no interruptions
- Premium listening experience: equalizer, hifi listening
- Premium mods: get access to more Audiomod presets

Trending Artists on Audiomack:
- YoungBoy Never Broke Again
- Yeat
- Post Malone
- Rod Wave
- Lil Durk
- Drake
- Burna Boy
- Asake
- Nicki Minaj
- Bad Bunny
- Peso Pluma

Explore the future of music streaming and offline listening—download Audiomack today and start discovering your sound.
Use of the Audiomack App and download feature is subject to your agreement with our Privacy Policy/TOS.

Privacy Policy: http://www.audiomack.com/privacy-policy
TOS: http://www.audiomack.com/about/terms-of-service

Explore the future of music – download Audiomack now!

Tired of being restricted by Wi-Fi or network when listening to your favorite music?
Imagine a world where you can immerse yourself in music anytime, anywhere, without relying on an internet connection.

Now! We proudly present ASMR Musi, the ultimate solution for your music playback needs.

Asmr Musi is an all-in-one audio app designed to provide users with a complete audio journey. The app brings together a variety of soundscapes such as the crunch of chewing, the rustle of turning pages, the sound of soft whispers, the warmth of wood, the crinkling of packaging, the melodies of instruments, the click of nails, the scribbles of pens, and more.

Each auditory selection has been carefully curated to provide the best relaxation experience.
The app has an intuitive and easy-to-use interface that easily guides users through various sound categories and allows users to save bookmarks based on their personal preferences. In addition, it allows users to enrich their listening experience and broaden their sound horizons by recording personal audio files.

For those who want to keep their unique auditory moments forever, the in-app recording feature is a perfect solution. It allows users to capture, edit recordings, and manage their audio library by removing outdated tracks, ensuring a fresh and tailored listening experience at all times.

What's that song? Shazam will instantly identify music playing around you or in apps like TikTok, Instagram, YouTube & Snapchat. Discover concerts near you, song lyrics, videos & more. With tens of millions of daily users, Shazam is trusted by music lovers worldwide.

“Shazam is a gift... a game changer” – Pharrell Williams, GQ 
“I don't know how we ever survived before Shazam” – Marshmello 
“Shazam is a kind of magic… You hear a song, hold your phone up like a wand and it tells you exactly what song it is, who sang it and lets you add it to your playlist or share it to your social media… How is that not magic?!” – Calum Scott

WHY YOU’LL LOVE IT

* Identify music in an instant.
* Discover live shows near you from your favourite artists or through curated recommendations.
* Recognise songs even when you’re offline, using headphones or on a different app.
* Revisit your music discovery history in your library anytime.
* Get recommended songs and playlists similar to the music you’ve discovered.

USE SHAZAM ANYWHERE, ANYTIME

* Enable the Shazam widgets on your Lock Screen or Home Screen.
* Ask Siri, “What’s this song?” to use Shazam hands-free.
* Automate music discovery with the Shazam Shortcut in the Shortcuts app.

CONNECT WITH YOUR MUSIC

* Unlock extras from artists around the world.
* Open any song directly in Apple Music, Spotify, YouTube Music, Amazon Music & Deezer.
* Listen and add songs directly to your Apple Music playlists.
* Watch music videos of the songs you discover in Apple Music or YouTube.
* Follow along to songs with real-time, karaoke-style lyrics.
* See what’s trending locally and globally with Shazam Charts.

Availability and features may vary by country. For more information on Shazam’s privacy practices, please read the Privacy Policy, available at https://www.apple.com/legal/privacy/. Find out more and get support from AppleCare at https://support.apple.com/guide/shazam/welcome.

With the Spotify app, you can explore an extensive library of music and podcasts for free. Curate the best playlists and stream millions of free songs, albums and original podcasts on your mobile or tablet. Subscribe to Spotify Premium to download and listen offline wherever you are, and unlock our catalogue of audiobooks.

Why choose Spotify as your go-to music and podcast app? Here, you can:
• Listen to over 100 million songs and 6 million podcast titles
• Explore our selection of specially-crafted artist playlists
• Easily search for your favourite songs, albums, artists and podcasts
• Discover personalised music recommendations tailored to your unique taste
• Subscribe to your favourite free podcasts so you never miss an episode and even curate your own podcast library

Spotify Free is more than a music player – find the sounds that you love and stream music and podcasts online for free. Enjoy personalised playlists or curate and share your own, discover the hottest new releases, explore upcoming events from your favourites and more.

• Stream millions of free songs and podcasts
• Create playlists with your favourite music
• Share songs and playlists with friends and family (feature restrictions may apply in some regions)
• Discover personalised playlists made just for you, and collaborate on playlists with your friends
• Enjoy your personal Discover Weekly playlist every week
• Stay in the know with the Release Radar and New Music Friday playlists
• Find nearby events and gigs by your favourite artists
• See your most played songs, genres, artists and more with yearly Spotify Wrapped
• Stream music across your devices with Spotify
• Use Spotify Connect and enjoy listening on smart speakers, desktop, laptop, smart TV, Chromecast, PlayStation®, Xbox®, smartwatch, in your car and more – limited number of device models apply

Spotify Premium – a great way to enjoy the benefits of an offline music player and stream music without Wi-Fi. By pressing download, you can access your songs, playlists, podcasts and audiobooks offline, wherever you are.
• Listen to music, podcasts and audiobooks – all in one place
• Ad-free music listening: enjoy your music with no ad interruptions
• Enjoy full on-demand playback
• Audiobooks in Premium are currently available in the UK, US, Australia, Ireland, New Zealand and Canada. Discover 250,000+ audiobook titles with 15 hours/month of available listening for Premium Individual subscribers and Duo & Family plan managers.
• Superior sound quality on supported devices
• AI DJ: a personalised guide that knows your music taste so well that it can choose what to play for you
• Enjoy on desktop, mobile phone, tablet, computer, smartwatch and in your car
• Listen and control the listening session together by hosting a Jam in real time with friends
• Download songs, podcasts and audiobooks for offline listening without an Internet connection
• No contract required – cancel your subscription whenever you want

Spotify lets you play music wherever you are. Listen to your favourite songs and discover new music, podcasts and audiobooks with the Spotify app!

LOVE SPOTIFY?

Boomplay music app is a music player with over 100M songs across different genres like Pop music, Rock, Afrobeats, Afropop and Reggae from top artists. Stream and download music including the best new songs, albums and curated playlists on Boomplay for free and play music offline data-free!

WHY YOU'LL LOVE BOOMPLAY?
- Discover New Music And Trending Songs
Boomplay music player boasts more than 100M songs which include the new music and podcasts. Come and search for your favourite songs, artist, or podcasts. 

- Download Songs And Listen Offline
Boomplay music downloader allows you to play your favourite songs offline. You can also use Boomplay as a media player to play all your local music offline like MP3s, AAC, M4A, WAV, and other files from the local files from your SD card or phone.

- Personalized Playlists Made Just For You 
Boomplay knows your music taste better than anyone. You will be surprised by what new music and songs our recommendations will help you discover.

- Support The Artists You Love!
Boomplay streams now count towards Billboard Music Charts including Billboard Hot 100, Artist 100 as well as all other Billboard U.S. and global charts. Every click of Play, Listen, Download on Boomplay, maximizes the exposure of the artists to help creating more new music for their fans.

- Equalizer
Build your Equalizer and enjoy your favourite trending songs. 

- Lyrics
See the lyrics to the trending music.

- More Than A Music App
Join the 'Live' section on Boomplay to chat with artists and like-minded people. There are featured topics, opportunities to showcase talent in the online live house, and have fun with friends and strangers through party games.

With Boomplay, you could access to a world of new music, playlists, artists, and podcasts you love. Here’s Boomplay, worthy of being your default Music Downloader!

BOOMPLAY SUBSCRIPTION FEATURES
- Unlimited Music Downloads
The Subscriber could enjoy music downloader with unlimited free downloads, so you can even listen to music offline, without using your data! 

- No Ads
The Boomplay music player allows you to listen to an album, playlist, songs or podcast without ad breaks. 

- Premium Music Content
Enjoy the premium playlists that are created exclusively for subscribers. Discover the best music and add the playlists to your favourites.

-Best Quality Music
Enjoy higher quality new music in full 320kbps.

Facebook：https://www.facebook.com/BoomplayMusic 
Instagram： https://instagram.com/boomplaymusic
Twitter： https://twitter.com/BoomplayMusic
YouTube： https://www.youtube.com/c/BoomplayMusic

PROBLEMS? FEEDBACKS?
Email: usersupport@boomplay.com

【Monthly Subscription】
-- Subscription Period: One month.
-- Subscription Price: First-time users who subscribe through the App Store will not be charged for the first month, from the second month users will be charged a monthly fee of 2.99USD / 1.49USD / 900NGN / 29.99ZAR etc.
-- Payment: The payment will be deducted from users iTunes account once the purchase is confirmed.
-- Renewal: Subscription renews automatically unless user disables the auto-renew function at least 24 hours before the expiry date.
-- Subscription Management: If you need to cancel your subscription, please manually open the 'Settings' of iOS —> enter 'iTunes Store and App Store' —> Click 'Apple ID' , enter the ' Account Settings —> Page, click 'Subscription' , select Boomplay Monthly Subscription and cancel your subscription.
-- Privacy Policy: https://www.boomplay.com/conditions
-- Terms of Auto-renew: https://www.boomplay.com/conditions#auto-renew

Alhamdulillah 
This app brings you the complete recitation of Sheikh  Siddiq Noreen (رحمه الله) along with powerful Islamic tools to make your daily worship easier.

Main Features
	• Quran Recitations
• Listen offline in lightweight audio (small app size).
• Stream in high quality online for the best sound.
• Save Surahs for offline listening in high quality — download only what you need, and free up space anytime by deleting them.
	• Prayer Times & Notifications
• Accurate prayer times for your location.
• Daily adhan reminders and notifications.
	• Morning, Evening & Daily Adhkar
• Complete azkar collections.
• Azkar reminders so you never forget.
	• Lightweight App
• Small app size (around 400MB), quick to install, doesn’t fill your storage.
	• Remove Ads Option
• Upgrade for a peaceful, uninterrupted experience with no ads.

Why This Update Matters

Previously, the full offline Quran was more than 2GB, making it too heavy for many users. Now the app is much lighter, while still giving you the flexibility to enjoy recitations your way:
	•	Listen offline in light mode (default).
	•	Stream in high quality online.
	•	Save your favorite Surahs in high quality for offline listening.

All while benefiting from prayer time alerts, azkar reminders, and a smoother, modern design.

Amplify your imagination. Powered by the world’s most advanced AI music model, Suno transforms your ideas into songs—no instruments needed, just your creative vision. Whether you’re a shower-singer, aspiring songwriter, or charting artist, Suno empowers you to create and discover music like never before.

Generate music from prompts, images, or videos with the world’s best AI music model:
• Transform your ideas into fully-produced songs and beats with a single prompt. Create 10 songs or beats per day at no cost.
• Inspiration begins with you. Write a text prompt like "Create a rap song about walking my dog," sing a melody, hum a tune, or tap out a beat.
• Record or upload audio to personalize your music, or generate songs from images and videos.

Write original lyrics with effortlessly:
• Whether you're in your feels with emotional ballads, hyped on energetic rap verses, or hooked on catchy pop, our lyrics generator and AI songwriter helps you craft custom lyrics that match your style and creative vision.

Create playlists for every mood and moment:
• Curate your personal AI music library and organize your favorite tracks, beats, and instrumentals into playlists you can revisit anytime.
• Manage your AI songs, view track details, and fine-tune your playlists—your music making journey is uniquely yours with Suno.

Discover new music and connect with artists:
• Stay inspired by listening to tracks created by other users and explore the best AI music across genres like rock, rap, hip hop, pop, and more.
• Find fresh favorites by browsing trending music and follow artists to stay connected.
• Discover new voice styles, AI covers, rising talent, and beat makers from around the world.

Music has no boundaries at Suno. Anything you imagine can take shape as a song to share. Whether you're taking your first steps in music making or chasing your next hit, infinite possibilities begin with a simple prompt in our AI song generator. Feeling pro? Take full creative control: adjust vocals, tweak structure, fine-tune melodies, and edit every detail to your vision.

Suno is how imagination becomes music, and music becomes yours.

Growing your music career on Audiomack just got so much easier with our Creator App - you can do everything from uploading tracks and managing your releases, to seeing your artist stats and messaging your fans all from your phone now. 

Upload as many tracks as you want - we have unlimited storage for artists, no subscription or payment required. (MP3s, WAV, M4A, AAC, and other local files)
View stats on your releases (plays, favorites, playlist adds, and re-ups)
See what cities and countries your music is getting the most traction in, and who your top fans are
See what your fans have to say about your tracks and directly reply to comments
Message your followers
Easily market your music with our Promote Tab (we auto-generate custom images for you to share on social media)
Earn money from your streams directly from us through our Artist Monetization Program, no distributor or label required
Monetize beyond streams - release music early and have fans pay to listen before the official release

Audiomack is the best app for emerging artists to be discovered - we care about what artists are bubbling next, not just what’s big now, and artists like Yeat, Rod Wave, and Joeboy launched their careers on Audiomack. We want to help you get discovered by your future fans - we have a global network of curators who hand select music to trend, and we have programs like Tastemakers where we engage music lovers worldwide to help find cool new artists.

Use of the Audiomack App and free upload feature is subject to your agreement with our Privacy Policy/TOS.

Privacy Policy: http://www.audiomack.com/privacy-policy
TOS: http://www.audiomack.com/about/terms-of-service

Create, share, and discover music without limits on BandLab – your all-in-one app for music creation, from ideation to distribution.

BandLab is your free song making and beat making app. Join over 60 million users expressing themselves freely on our social music platform. No matter your skill level or background, BandLab is your creative outlet with features designed for every step of your musical journey!

Record music on the go with an intuitive Digital Audio Workstation (DAW), built-in effects, and royalty free loops and samples – BandLab is the creative tool right in your pocket.

Create without limits with our multi-track Studio:
• An intuitive Digital Audio Workstation (DAW) to record, edit, and remix your music
• Apply built-in effects, or find loops and samples from our royalty-free sound packs to build a beat
• Access creator-friendly tools like Metronome, Tuner, AutoPitch (a pitch correction tool), and AudioStretch (a music transcription tool)
• Unlimited cloud storage and accessibility across all devices so you can take your Studio anywhere, and make music using just your desktop, tablet, or phone

Be part of a music-loving community:
• Connect and collaborate with like-minded artists
• Create playlists in your favorite genres
• Watch live streams from fellow creators

Propel your creator journey with BandLab Membership:
• Get early access to experimental features with Backstage Pass
• Score exclusive music industry access through Opportunities
• Release your music on major streaming platforms with Distribution
• Unlock more artist-centric features like Fan Reach and Profile Boost

Download BandLab now to explore a world of exciting possibilities!

► FEATURES:

• *NEW* Drum Machine – Our online sequencer makes it seamless to craft drum parts for your song. Create rhythmic drum patterns quickly with a library of genre-diverse drum sounds.
• Sampler – Make your own samples by recording sounds around you, or choose from over 15,000 royalty-free sounds and beats from BandLab Sounds to build a beat.
• 16-Track Studio – Bring your Studio anywhere. Access our multi-track DAW from anywhere – use it as an audio recording app, build a beat right from your phone, and more!
• 330+ Virtual MIDI Instruments – Need 808s for your beats, or synthesizers for your lead lines? Access over 330+ cutting-edge Virtual MIDI instruments to craft your beats right in Studio!
• Metronome and Tuner – Practice anywhere with our in-app Metronome and Tuner – designed for the modern music maker and producer.
• 300+ Vocal/Guitar/Bass Audio Presets – Unlock a curated library of world-class effects and presets for free. From ambient sounds to modulation effects, change up your sound in an instant.
• AutoPitch - Record your best vocals yet with this quality Auto-Tune alternative. Experiment and get creative with five unique vocal effects – Classic, Duet, Robot, Big Harmony, and Modern Rap.
• Looper – New to composing? Just pick a Looper pack in a genre you like, load it up, and you’ll have a starting point for building a simple beat or crafting a backing track!
• Mastering – Master unlimited tracks online for free before releasing your songs. Get a polished sound instantly with four mastering presets, created by Grammy-winning producers and sound engineers.
• Remix Tracks – Need inspiration for your next masterpiece? Put your unique twist on a public “Forkable” track shared by a fellow creator – remix their song and make it your own!
• Easy Beat Making - Craft a simple beat to rap or sing over with intuitive music making tools. Use royalty-free samples and artist packs as a quick starting point in Studio!
• Creator Connect - Connect with like-minded creators from around the world and start an epic music collaboration, wherever you are.

Terms of Use: https://blog.bandlab.com/terms-of-use/
Privacy Policy: https://blog.bandlab.com/privacy-policy/

app_name: Beat Maker Pro - DJ Drum Pad
description:
Are you looking for the ultimate beat-making trainer? Look no further and choose Beat Maker Pro.

Beat Maker Pro will boost your rhythm skills through guided beat-making lessons, whether you are a beginner or an advanced musician. If you wonder… YES, beat-making is for everyone!

Beat Maker Pro is your ideal music coach that will guide you through beat composition in no time.

Play your first song in three lessons, then improve with our skill-building exercises, challenge yourself and keep making beats!

Enjoy our regularly updated world-class catalogue, including famous tracks and sample packs made by professional beat-makers. 

Features:

- Train to play pads with over 1000 lessons and unique sound packs
- Learn tips and tricks conceived by experienced beat makers
- Master all music styles: EDM, trap, house, pop, electro…and more
- Tap and Learn: intuitive drum pads
- Creative finger drumming. Use drums, piano, and FX
- Share your music and beat productions with the world!
- Challenge yourself in our career mode and earn Superstar status!

Premium benefits:

The premium subscription allows you to access all the present and upcoming Premium features and remove all ads from your experience. It also gives you access to exclusive sample packs in our catalogue all regularly uploaded sample packs.



Privacy Policy & Terms of Service: http://musicworldmedia.com/products/drum-pad/tos

Tambayoyin Sheikh Jafar Mahmud Adam Da Kuma Amsoshinsu. Saurari Tambayoyi Dubu (1000) Tambaya Mabudin ilimi ce.

Tambayoyi da amsoshinsu daga bakin sheikh jafar mahmud adam. Domin samun wadansu karatuttukan sheikh jafar duba cikin play store.

Yana aiki ba tare da internet ba

Download and listen questions and answers by Ja'afar mahmoud adam. This app works perfectly offline.

Download and listen free sheikh jafar mahmud questions and answers on marriage and relationship issues.

----------

Amsoshin wadansu tambayoyi da yanuwa sukayi akan aure. Mai bada amsoshin shine malam jafar mahmud adam.

Idan kun ji dadin wannan application na tambayoyin sheikh jafar kada ku manta kuyi rating dinsa tauraro biyar cikin wannan gida sannan ku aikawa wasu wannan manhajjar.

Aciki akwai Sheikh Jafar Tambayoyin Aure kamar haka:

Auren mace Kirista ko bayahudiya wane ne zai zama alwalinta ?

Kusantar mace bayan biyan sadaki kafin aure halal ko haram?

Mace mai haila a gidansu amma babu aure wai shin duk abincin da taci haram ne har sai an aurar da ita ?

Yaushe ne aure ke tabbata? bayan sadaki ko kuwa?

Mata da miji cikin talabishin wai ana gayyatar jamaa zuwa daurin aure, shin hakan ya halatta?

Yarinya bata son saurayin amma iyaye naso, to yaya za'ayi?

Budurwa nasa hijab da niqab amma samari na dauka cewa ita matar aure ce, yaya zatayi kenan?

Mutum da yarinya sun fahimci juna amma iyaye sunce a'a basa son auren to yaya zaayi ?

Amfani da magani domin tsayar da alada cikin ramadan, halal ko haram ?

Nasiha kan amfani da waya ga ma'aurata

Miji yace matarsa ta rika zuwa dakinsa bayan kammala girkin dare amma taki dole kullum sai yaje ya kirawota, me ya kamata yayi?

Yarinya taga mahaifiyarta tana saka magani cikin abincin babansu domin sihirceshi, me ya kamata tayi?

Shin mutum zai iya yanka abin suna fiye da daya ?

Yanuwan kishiyata sunce nayi asiri, ya zanyi, ya halatta na kai kara kotu?

Nasiha kan rashin godiyar mazaje ga matayensu

Miji ya zabi mace daya cikin matansa domin ajiyar mukullan dukiyarsa, shin hakan daidai ne ?

Neman taimakon sadaki domin yin aure ya kamata ??

Shin ya halatta asha maganin hana haihu saboda wadansu muhimman dalilai?

Yankan rago ranar suna wajibi ne ko kuwa ?

Idan miji ya nemi matarsa amma taki toh ya tabbata cikin hadisi zata kwana mala'iku na la'antarta to mene hukunci idan kuma ita matarce ta nemi mijin amma yaki?

Ya halatta mutum ya koyawa matarsa mota ?

TAMBAYOYI DUBU 1000 NA SHEIK JA'AFAR MAHMUD ADAM

wannan Application mai suna " Tambayoyi 100 na sheik ja'afar." yana dauke da irin tambayoyin da yan uwa musulmai suke yiwa marigayi sheik jaafar mahmud adam lokacin gudanar da tafsiri ko kuma alokacin dayaje wajen walima ko kuma gasar karatun alQur'ani mai Girma.

Sheik jafar tambayoyi 1000 (dubu da amsoshinsu)
Sheik jafar 1000 question and answer
Tambayoyi 1000 dubu by sheik jaafar

The application provides streaming for non-commercial use only. All music content is legal. Note: This app is not a YouTube music downloader. YouTube music can be streamed but not downloaded.

• Ad-Free option.

Forget about having to look for new phone ringtones once and for all! 

Our ringtone maker allows you to create any ringtone you like. 

Pick an existing audio or video file to cut yourself a unique ringtone on the go. 

With Garage Ringtones, you get an easy-to-use and intuitive ringtone maker packed with useful features:

Set your new ringtones from existing files;
Customize your notification sounds;
Cut your favorite tunes and audio files to get 100% custom ringtones in no time;
Set unique ringtones for any contacts you desire to know who’s calling you without looking at the screen.  

And the cherry on the pie? Garage Ringtones is making ringtone selection easier for you! We have a dedicated TikTok channel where we handpick the juiciest and most popular songs for you to download and use as ringtones. 

Our TikTok channel is brimming with content. From recent hits to cult classics, Garage Ringtones’ collection of songs is always there for you!

Garage Ringtones uses GarageBand to export edited songs or audio files to ringtones. Don’t worry - the process is very straightforward and won’t take longer than a minute or two. Garage Ringtones features an in-app video with step-by-step guidelines on exporting your favorite tunes without breaking a sweat!

The app also supports ‘fade in’ and ‘fade out’ features and allows you to browse your edit history. 

With Garage Ringtones, you get the one ringtone maker to rule them all! User-friendly, with a brief and detailed tutorial, the possibility to use any TikTok audio as custom ringtones, and bonus access to our TikTok channel with all the top hits from both modern music artists and famous classical performers.

developer: MOBIVERSITE YAZILIM BILISIM REKLAM VE DANISMANLIK HIZMETLERI SANAYI TICARET LIMITED STI
description:
Discover the future of music creation with Donna – where AI meets artistry to empower anyone to become a music maker. Whether you’re stepping into the world of music for the first time or you’re a pro musician, Donna brings your musical visions to life, effortlessly.


Why Donna?

Innovative AI Music Creation: At the heart of Donna lies a revolutionary AI that understands the intricacies of music genres, instruments, and vocals. It crafts entire songs in seconds, complete with lyrics and realistic sound, based on the vibe you describe.


Genre-Defying Compositions: Imagine melding the high energy of Rap with the majestic sound of pop vocals. Donna breaks the boundaries of traditional music genres, offering limitless creative possibilities.


Accessible to All: You don’t need to be a music theory expert or a proficient instrumentalist. If you have an idea, Donna has the tools to bring it to life. Music creation is now accessible to everyone, fostering a community of creators who share a passion for innovation and artistry.


Inspiration at Your Fingertips: Donna doesn’t just save time; it’s a muse that provides unexpected musical starting points. Find inspiration in the AI’s creations and refine them to make something uniquely yours.


Key Features:

- Instant Song Creation: Describe the vibe you’re going for and let Donna handle the rest. From composing to producing, experience the magic of having an AI-powered music studio in your pocket.

- Wide Range of Genres: With an expansive understanding of musical styles, Donna allows you to explore and combine genres in ways you’ve never imagined.

- Realistic Vocals and Instruments: Donna’s advanced AI generates songs complete with lyrics sung in a voice that’ll make you do a double-take and instruments that sound like the real deal.

- Extend Your Tracks: Effortlessly increase the length of your song to better match your creative vision and ensure it meets your desired duration.

- STEM Separation: Effortlessly separate your tracks into individual stems, allowing you to isolate vocals, instruments, and beats for further mixing and editing.

- User-Friendly Interface: We believe in keeping complexities under the hood. Donna offers a sleek, intuitive interface that makes music creation enjoyable and straightforward.

Whether you’re looking to create your next big hit, experiment with different sounds, or simply have fun making music, Donna is here to support your creative ambitions. Dive into a world of endless musical possibilities, and let your imagination lead the way.

To create music, you’ll need a Donna pro subscription. Pro subscription opens the door to amazing musical possibilities, allowing you to fully immerse yourself in your creative journey.
Extend, STEM Separation, and Proof of Creation features are not included in the subscription. The subscription covers music creation only. You can purchase the Extend, STEM Separation, and Proof of Creation features separately
Information about the auto-renewable nature of the subscriptions
Subscriptions will automatically renew unless cancelled at least one day before the renewal date within 24 hours before the end of the current period.
Payment will be charged to your Apple ID account at the confirmation of purchase.
If you subscribe before a free trial ends, the remainder of the trial period will be forfeited.
You can manage and cancel your subscription by going to your account settings in the App Store
